NZBFinder.ws >
Home

Because we make our service available for free, we rely on voluntary donations and contributions in order to keep the indexing platform going.

If you need unrestricted access to the API or RSS feeds (necessary for software like Sonarr/Radarr/SickRage etc.) then it's best to get one of our premium levels. An indexer like NZB Finder runs on pretty heavy hardware and uses tons of bandwidth daily to bring you the best Usenet has to offer. All this isn't free and requires a lot of personal time on top of that. Therefore every contribution helps to keep the service online and to keep it as fast as it currently is.

Notice

security

At no point do your card details touch our servers. All sensitive information is instantly transmitted client-side to our PCI-DSS compliant payment processor (currently Stripe Inc.) and we destroy the form fields before processing anything else.

PAYMENT METHODS

We are only able to process these creditcards: Visa, Mastercard and AMEX. Additionally, if you are from Europe we offer a few localized payment methods for your country. You'll see them on the checkout page. Please do not e-mail us about PayPal, we do not support it and never will.

DECLINED PAYMENTS

Payments can be denied by our payment providers if you're using Tor, Proxies or a VPN from a known provider. Please keep this in mind when your payment fails but the information was entered correctly. We cannot see why your payment fails, please contact your bank first instead of e-mailing us.

  • Payment options
  • Anonymous VPN
  • Secure Password Manager
  • Encrypted File Storage

See our plans below. All of our plans are (for now) only available as a pre-paid or "manual" option which you need to extend yourself each year.

We will ALWAYS e-mail you before the expiration date, so make sure your e-mail address is valid and check your spam folders.

Many of our users want to stay fully anonymous when using the internet and/or downloading files. We can reccommend either NordVPN or PrivateInternetAccess. Keep in mind that your payment might get declined when paying with a creditcard with a VPN connected.

  • Being based in Panama, NordVPN falls under the country’s jurisdiction and Panama has no data retention laws
  • Military-grade AES-256-CBC encryption and a variety of protocols to choose from: OpenVPN (UDP and TCP), PPTP, L2TP/IPSec, IKEv2/IPSec
  • Risk-free 30-day money-back guarantee
  • Unlimited bandwidth and data
  • Strict and audited "no logs" policy.
  • Cryptocurrencies accepted

Private Internet Access

Another option is PIA, which has also proven themselves to be a rock-solid player in the VPN market. Click the banner below to check them out.

With NordPass, store your passwords in the cloud, access them on desktop, mobile, or your favorite browser. All encrypted on your device, for your eyes only.

  • Auto-fill passwords
  • Risk-free 30-day money-back guarantee
  • Auto-generate secure passwords
  • Cryptocurrencies accepted
  • Securely store creditcard information

NordLocker is not cloud storage. We believe it's better. Think of it as middleware that adds a security layer to your data. NordLocker never stores your files anywhere. Instead it lets you maintain the flexibility of keeping them wherever you're used to, only securely.

  • Security powered by state-of-the-art encryption
  • Risk-free 30-day money-back guarantee
  • Secure file sharing
  • Cryptocurrencies accepted
  • One password for all your lockers
Click here to checkout NordLocker.
